• Open

    Bekalan minyak masak di Kelantan menyusut menjelang perayaan
    KPDN Kelantan mendapati bekalan minyak masak menyusut di pasaran susulan berlakunya pembelian pada jumlah banyak menjelang Aidilfitri.  ( 37 min )
    Israel mengaku salah bunuh 7 staf agensi bantuan di Gaza
    Pasukan terlibat serangan itu kononnya tidak dapat melihat dengan jelas logo WCK pada bumbung kenderaan tersebut kerana keadaan gelap.  ( 37 min )
    Aidilfitri: Aliran trafik tinggi, perlahan di beberapa lebuh raya utama petang ini
    Setakat 3.30 petang ini, terdapat pertambahan kenderaan keluar dari ibu kota dengan trafik perlahan dilaporkan di Lebuhraya Utara Selatan (PLUS) dan Lebuhraya Kuala Lumpur-Karak (KLK).  ( 37 min )
    Jordan desak pembukaan semua lintasan, hentikan kebuluran di Gaza
    Jordan mendesak pembukaan semua lintasan darat ke Semenanjung Gaza selain mahu kebuluran di wilayah yang telah diserang tanpa henti oleh Israel dihentikan.  ( 37 min )
    Ongkili bercuti, Joachim pemangku Presiden PBS bermula 1 Jun
    Presiden Parti Bersatu Sabah (PBS) Datuk Seri Dr Maximus Ongkili akan mula bercuti daripada memegang jawatan tertinggi parti itu bermula 1 Jun.  ( 37 min )
    Sempena Ramadan, Masjid Al-Mukhlisin kumpul keberkatan
    Masjid Al-Mukhlisin bukan sahaja tempat ibadah, tetapi juga medan ilmu dan jalinan ukhuwah.  ( 37 min )
    Operasi KAHB ditamatkan, bukan tutup - Sanusi
    Operasi Kedah Agro Holdings Berhad (KAHB) telah ditamatkan bagi membolehkan syarikat itu melunaskan tunggakan gaji dan hutang yang diwarisi.  ( 37 min )
    Bintang muda Jamaica lebur rekod 22 tahun milik Usain Bolt
    Bintang muda Jamaica mencipta sejarah dengan memecahkan rekod dunia Usain Bolt dalam acara 400 meter bagi kategori B17.  ( 37 min )

    Keputusan PRN Selangor merupakan amaran terakhir buat parti itu dan kalau itu masih belum celikkan parti, tiada apa lagi yang boleh sedarkan UMNO Selangor.  ( 37 min )

    Kerajaan negeri akan melihat beberapa aspek sebelum tindakan lanjut diambil berdasarkan laporan daripada Jabatan Perikanan negeri termasuk jumlah penternak dan sebagainya.  ( 37 min )

    AI-as-a-Service Providers Vulnerable to PrivEsc and Cross-Tenant Attacks
    New research has found that artificial intelligence (AI)-as-a-service providers such as Hugging Face are susceptible to two critical risks that could allow threat actors to escalate privileges, gain cross-tenant access to other customers' models, and even take over the continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines.     CISO Perspectives on Complying with Cybersecurity Regulations
    Compliance requirements are meant to increase cybersecurity transparency and accountability. As cyber threats increase, so do the number of compliance frameworks and the specificity of the security controls, policies, and activities they include. For CISOs and their teams, that means compliance is a time-consuming, high-stakes process that demands strong organizational and
    From PDFs to Payload: Bogus Adobe Acrobat Reader Installers Distribute Byakugan Malware
    Bogus installers for Adobe Acrobat Reader are being used to distribute a new multi-functional malware dubbed Byakugan. The starting point of the attack is a PDF file written in Portuguese that, when opened, shows a blurred image and asks the victim to click on a link to download the Reader application to view the content.     Considerations for Operational Technology Cybersecurity
    Operational Technology (OT) refers to the hardware and software used to change, monitor, or control the enterprise's physical devices, processes, and events. Unlike traditional Information Technology (IT) systems, OT systems directly impact the physical world. This unique characteristic of OT brings additional cybersecurity considerations not typically present in conventional IT security

    Malicious Apps Caught Secretly Turning Android Phones into Proxies for Cybercriminals
    Several malicious Android apps that turn mobile devices running the operating system into residential proxies (RESIPs) for other threat actors have been observed on the Google Play Store. The findings come from HUMAN's Satori Threat Intelligence team, which said the cluster of VPN apps came fitted with a Golang library that transformed the user's device into a proxy node without their knowledge.

  • Open

    Hackers Target macOS Users with Malicious Ads Spreading Stealer Malware
    Malicious ads and bogus websites are acting as a conduit to deliver two different stealer malware, including Atomic Stealer, targeting Apple macOS users. The ongoing infostealer attacks targeting macOS users may have adopted different methods to compromise victims' Macs, but operate with the end goal of stealing sensitive data, Jamf Threat Labs said in a report published Friday. One
    Urgent: Secret Backdoor Found in XZ Utils Library, Impacts Major Linux Distros
    RedHat on Friday released an "urgent security alert" warning that two versions of a popular data compression library called XZ Utils (previously LZMA Utils) have been backdoored with malicious code designed to allow unauthorized remote access. The software supply chain compromise, tracked as CVE-2024-3094, has a CVSS score of 10.0, indicating maximum severity. It impacts XZ Utils

    Laporan daripada Hospital Port Dickson memaklumkan mangsa berada dalam keadaan kritikal akibat terjatuh daripada kenderaan.  ( 37 min )

    Mohd Na'im akan jalani pembedahan kecil membuang kelenjar air liur yang mengandungi batu karang pada pukul 8 pagi ini.  ( 37 min )

    Ahmad Zahid berkata, al-Quran adalah petunjuk dan membimbing manusia ke arah kebaikan dan kebenaran serta meningkatkan keimanan.  ( 37 min )

    Sisa makanan adalah tragedi global, berjuta orang kelaparan hari ini kerana makanan dibazirkan di seluruh dunia.  ( 37 min )

    Dana zakat berjumlah RM11,772,300 diserahkan kepada penghulu mukim dari 12 daerah mewakili 39,241 asnaf fakir dan miskin di Perak.  ( 37 min )

    A new security shortcoming discovered in Apple M-series chips could be exploited to extract secret keys used during cryptographic operations. Dubbed GoFetch, the vulnerability relates to a microarchitectural side-channel attack that takes advantage of a feature known as data memory-dependent prefetcher (DMP) to target constant-time cryptographic implementations and capture sensitive data

    N. Korea-linked Kimsuky Shifts to Compiled HTML Help Files in Ongoing Cyberattacks
    The North Korea-linked threat actor known as Kimsuky (aka Black Banshee, Emerald Sleet, or Springtail) has been observed shifting its tactics, leveraging Compiled HTML Help (CHM) files as vectors to deliver malware for harvesting sensitive data. Kimsuky, active since at least 2012, is known to target entities located in South Korea as well as North America, Asia, and Europe. According
    German Police Seize 'Nemesis Market' in Major International Darknet Raid
    German authorities have announced the takedown of an illicit underground marketplace called Nemesis Market that peddled narcotics, stolen data, and various cybercrime services. The Federal Criminal Police Office (aka Bundeskriminalamt or BKA) said it seized the digital infrastructure associated with the darknet service located in Germany and Lithuania and confiscated €94,000 ($102,107)
